article_title: Intravenous drug use in rural Kentucky carries risk of explosion of HIV
article_text: A drug-fueled HIV outbreak infecting 160 people in Austin, Ind. — population 4,200 — is shocking the nation. But it didn't surprise University of Kentucky researcher Jennifer Havens.

article_metadata.news-keywords: kentucky, hiv, indiana, sick, intravenous, drug, aids, infection, needles, rates, hepatitis
